patthana15.5:1.1: Hetuṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.5:2.1: Nahetuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.5:3.1: Hetuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
